before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"5o8h1","text":"Before starting the experiment, validate the level od depletion of your batch of antibody by FACS (use spleen or blood sample to check the number of NK cells  4 or 7 days after antibody administration). Make sure to use a staining antibody for a marker other than the one targeted with a depletion antibody. I use Nkp46. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fu69a","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"12nrv","text":"My protocol is based on depleting the NK cells for 4 days (two doses) before injecting tumour cells, followed by a weekly administration of the depleting antibody afterwards. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7qvh8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6dlh","text":"This schedule should be checked and adapted for any other setting/experiment. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dnm51","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"atoqj","text":"For NK cell depletion in C57Bl/6 mice, use the following antibody and corresponding isotype control:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":25,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3eub2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"25bjn","text":"Isotype control is Mouse IgG2a, κ (InVivoMAb, clone C1.18.4, catalog number BE0085)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c7eit","text":"NK cell neutralising antibody is Nk1.1 (Clone PK136, generated in-house from a hybridoma line, or purchased commercially)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9d7n","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dvlq0","text":"Most references use 200-300 ug of NK1.1 antibody per mouse, with various frequencies, from 1x week to 3x week","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4thm9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bb6b2","text":"Smyth et al. 1998 (200 ug)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"flo1i","text":"Nishikado et al. 2011 (300 ug)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"16n44","text":"Victorino et al. 2015 (200 ug)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4rjho","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bg4pg","text":"For NK cell depletion in 129SvEv mice, use the following antibody, because 129S strain NK cells do not express Nk1.1:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":24,"length":13}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ankci","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"14kes","text":"Polyclonal rabbit IgG (InVivoMAb, BE0095, Isotype Control)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cpel0","text":"Asialo GM1 Polyclonal Antibody, Functional Grade, eBioscience™ (ThermoFisher, Catalog # 16-6507-39)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"85p9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9rqq2","text":"Dose:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4v9hb","text":"10 uL (anti-asialo GM1), diluted to 100 uL with PBS prior to the injection","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2t4jl","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9eu5","text":"N.B. Anti-asialo GM1 antibody also depletes basophils.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"ae5jj","text":"This protocol describes a validated procedure for antibody depletion of natural killer cells in mice (C57Bl/6J and 129SvEv strains), combined with the injection of cancer cells i.v. It is based on combining a few references and testing the optimal antibody concentration and frequency of injection to achieve good level of depletion, minimise animal injection frequency, and reagent consumption. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d9fuo","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9iuu1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it’s working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"4ude8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"beci9","text":"Mice will receive an i.p. injection of the antibody in 200 µl PBS (Day 1) e.g. Monday","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":26,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5p2em","text":"Mice will receive an i.p. injection of the antibody in 200 µl PBS (Day 4) e.g. Thursday","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fpvj6","text":"Mice will receive tail vein injection of the cell suspension in 100 µl PBS (Day 5) e.g. Friday","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"da6da","text":"Mice will receive an i.p. injection of the antibody in 200 µl PBS (Day 11, 18, 25) i.e. once per week","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5e39r","text":"Mice will be culled after 28 days from the day of tumour cell injection or at an appropriate time-point for any particular experimental setting.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Natural killer cell depletion in vivo (mouse)

versions.title: Natural killer cell depletion in vivo (mouse)
